Title: Relates to requiring residential health care facilities to notify certain persons of a contagious or infectious disease in the facility and where a list of violations the facility has received can be found
Summary: Requires residential health care facilities to notify residents and their designated contacts within twelve hours of the presence of a contagious or infectious disease in the facility; requires such facilities to inform certain persons of where they can locate a list of any violations the facility has received.
LawCode: Add ยง2803-z, amd ยง2803, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring residential health care facilities to notify certain persons of a contagious or infectious disease in the facility and where a list of violations the facility has received can be found
